ProjectTitle: Motherhood and maternity leave: effects and responses from workers and firms in the presence of informal labor markets
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/07/2022
5. Data storage
Dropbox with password protection won't be suitable for confidential data. You either need to encrypt the data. Or maybe use a KU Leuven server or OneDrive. You can check secure options here: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en

7. Data sharing
Ku Leuven RDR (research data repository) is an option: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
